mapper.select: SELECT /* RetrieveStudentAcademicHistoryList */ STD_ID AS "studentID" , SEQNO AS "seqNo" , ACD_NM AS "academicName" , ACD_DESC AS "academicDesc" , STRT_DT AS "startDate" , END_DT AS "endDate" , CERT_DT AS "certificatedDate" FROM FRST.STD_ACD_HIS WHERE STD_ID = #{studentID} AND STCD <> '09' ORDER BY SEQNO
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterStudentAcademicHistory */ INTO FRST.STD_ACD_HIS ( STD_ID , SEQNO , ACD_NM , ACD_DESC , STRT_DT , END_DT , CERT_DT , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{studentID} , #{seqNo} , COALESCE(#{academicName}, '') , COALESCE(#{academicDesc}, '') , COALESCE(#{startDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{endDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{certificatedDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateNewsEvent */ FRST.NEWS_EVENT SET TITLE = COALESCE(#{title}, TITLE) , CONTENT_HTML = COALESCE(#{contentHtml}, CONTENT_HTML) , CONTENT_DESC = COALESCE(#{contentDesc}, CONTENT_DESC) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) WHERE NEVNT_ID = #{newsEventID}
